chapters.title: Chapter 15: What Can Be Learned in Dreams
chapters.info: Corianin Nedeal, p. 284 (203)—Last Dreamer in the White Tower; an Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She died almost 400 years ago. Almost all of the ter'angreal the Black Ajah stole from the Tower were last studied by her; they allow partial access to Tel'aran'rhiod, the World of Dreams.
